name: DiceWitch
description:
Defend a small village as a cute witch using magic dice!

Swap your current dice with your number keys or by using your scroll wheel.

The D6 and D20 deal flat damage

The D8 bounces off of enemies and terrain

The D12 explodes on impact

Try to kill as many enemies as you can before your inevitable demise!

Huge thanks to Austin for making the detailed drawing of the witch main character!

This is my first ever entry to a gamejam, and my first ever playable game. I know it's real rough, but it was fun to participate this year! Hopefully I'll be able to do better next time. Any sort of feedback would be massively appreciated!
